title: ASR
name: Access Service Request Number
definition: Identifies the number that may be generated by the provider's mechanized systems, pre-assigned to the customer by the provider, or manually assigned by the provider to identify  a customer's request for service.
fieldNotes: Any reissuance can use this entry to uniquel y identify the form from any other version.

The version identification does not have to agree w ith the provider order supplement identification. The customer's order may have been supplemented internally many times after the ASR has been issued.
validEntryNotes: Valid IAC codes are maintained by  Telcordi a  Technologies.
usageNotes:
Required when ASR NO is pre-assigned. 
Required on all supplements when PON is not unique. 
Otherwise optional.
